entry.value: library(flowCore)%%00010library(Biobase)%%00010library(Rtsne)%%00010library(foreach)%%00010library(doParallel)%%00010library(parallel)%%00010numCores <- detectCores()%%00010cl <- makeCluster(knime.flow.in[["num.cores"]]) %%00010registerDoParallel(cl)%%00010files <- list.files(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], full.name = TRUE, pattern = ".fcs")%%00010dir.create(paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/BHT.SNE.2D", sep = ""))%%00010processInput <- function(i) { %%00010 cols <- knime.in%%00010 fs <- read.flowSet(files = NULL, path = knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], pattern = "fcs")%%00010 df <- as.data.frame(exprs(fs[[i]]))%%00010 df2 <- as.matrix(df[, which(names(df) %in% c(as.character(t(cols))))])%%00010 unique_mydata <- unique(df2)%%00010 rtsne_out <- Rtsne(unique_mydata, dims = 2, perplexity = knime.flow.in[["perplexity"]], theta = knime.flow.in[["theta"]], pca = FALSE, check_duplicates = FALSE, max_iter = knime.flow.in[["max_iter"]])%%00010 new.cols <- rtsne_out$Y%%00010 channel_number <- ncol(fs[[i]]) + 1;%%00010 channel_id <- paste("$P", channel_number, sep="");%%00010 channel_name <- "BHT.SNE.2D.Dim1";%%00010 channel_range <- max(new.cols[,1]) + 1;%%00010 plist <- matrix(c(channel_name, channel_name, channel_range, 0, channel_range - 1));%%00010 rownames(plist) <- c("name", "desc", "range", "minRange", "maxRange");%%00010 colnames(plist) <- c(channel_id);%%00010 channel_number2 <- ncol(fs[[i]]) + 2;%%00010 channel_id2 <- paste("$P", channel_number2, sep="");%%00010 channel_name2 <- "BHT.SNE.2D.Dim2";%%00010 channel_range2 <- max(new.cols[,2]) + 1;%%00010 plist2 <- matrix(c(channel_name2, channel_name2, channel_range2, 0, channel_range2 - 1));%%00010 rownames(plist2) <- c("name", "desc", "range", "minRange", "maxRange");%%00010 colnames(plist2) <- c(channel_id2);%%00010 params <- parameters(fs[[i]]);%%00010 pd <- pData(params);%%00010 pd <- rbind(pd, t(plist), t(plist2));%%00010 pData(params) <- pd;%%00010 out_data <- cbind(exprs(fs[[i]]), "BHT.SNE.2D.Dim1" = new.cols[,1], "BHT.SNE.2D.Dim2" = new.cols[,2]);%%00010 out_frame <- flowFrame(out_data, params, description = description(fs[[i]]));%%00010 write.FCS(out_frame, paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/BHT.SNE.2D/", sampleNames(fs[i]), sep = ""), what="numeric")%%00010}%%00010file_number <- length(files)%%00010results <- foreach(i = 1:file_number, .packages = c("flowCore", "Biobase", "Rtsne")) %dopar% { %%00010 processInput(i)%%00010}%%00010knime.out <- as.data.frame(exprs(read.FCS(paste(knime.flow.in[["dirname"]], "/BHT.SNE.2D/", basename(files[[1]]), sep = ""))))%%00010%%00010%%00010

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
